ingredients.ingredient: 1 (4 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
1 (16 ounce) package chocolate sandwich cookies, crushed

cookingTips: Crush cookies to various sizes for a more textured 'dirt' appearance
Layer ingredients strategically for visual appeal
Chill until serving for best texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you make this fun dessert even more visually appealing for kids?
